summary: Two fraternity pledges travel to a sleazy bar in search of a stripper for their college friends, unaware it is occupied by vampires.
cast: Chris Makepeace|Sandy Baron|Robert Rusler|Dedee Pfeiffer|Gedde Watanabe|Grace Jones|Billy Drago|Brad Logan|Lisa Lyon|Jim Boyle|Larry Spinak|Eric Welch|Stuart Rogers|Gary Swailes|Ray Ballard|Paunita Nichols|Trudel Williams|Marlon McGann|Thomas Bellin|Bryan Michael McGuire|Leila Lee Olsen|Hillary Carlip|Francie Swift|Tricia Brown|Naomi Shohan|Janeen Davis|Ytossie Patterson|Tanya Papanicolas|Robin Kaufman|Hy Pyke|Bob Schott|Adam Barth|Bill Morphew|Simmy Bow|Roger Hampton|Andy Rivas|Julius LeFlore|Greg Lewis|Dar Robinson|Viva Sex
title: Vamp
